title: Freelo for bronze/silver
body: Pros do it already. Ready? Ignite on supports. No one in bronze silver do it, but every bronze silver is stupid enough to use heal mid ignite. Throw that in with thresh or another strong support and it is gg for the bot lane, which often times, gives up the most kills or death. While individually they may not always be that valuable, the kills they potentially give up are game changing.
